amendment.description: To modify requirements regarding training to operate aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 909 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 909 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S7802-7804; text: CR S7802-7803) To modify requirements regarding training to operate aircraft.
